alert.note: Alert for Aroostook; Penobscot (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 22 at 5:53PM EDT until May 22 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN AROOSTOOK AND CENTRAL PENOBSCOT COUNTIES... At 552 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Medway, or near Millinocket, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Millinocket, East Millinocket, Medway, Mattawamkeag, Chester, Winn, Woodville, Macwahoc, Molunkus, Grindstone, Cedar Lake, Silver Ridge and Benedicta. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
